com.tyrlib2.graphics.renderer

Class OpenGLRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.renderer.OpenGLRenderer

  • public class OpenGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class initiates the actual rendering.

    Sascha

    • Field Detail

      • BACKGROUND_CHANNEL

        public static final int BACKGROUND_CHANNEL
        These are the default rendering channels. They are rendered starting with the lowest number.
